casebody.data:
RIPELLINO
v.
BOARD OF EDUCATION. No. 180A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 31, 2006. Stephanie H. Autry, Rachel B. Esposito, Meredith T. Black, Raleigh, James R. Lawrence, Jr., for Johnston County Bd. of Ed. *300Bradley N. Schulz, Smithfield, for Michael Ripellino, et al. T. Carlton Younger, III, for School Boards, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of July 2006 by Defendants (N.C. School Boards Association, et al) for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendants (N.C. School Boards Association, et al) shall have up to and including the 28th day of August 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 31st day of July 2006."
